pageProduct.name: Alkira Triple Duty Antioxidant Facial Serum 30ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

An anti-ageing dream team of Bakuchiol + EFAs + Antioxidants + Bioactive Natives. Encourage firm, flawless skin with our multi-targeted Bakuchiol, Australian native complex and EFA serum.

Warnings

Avoid contact with eyes. If irritation occurs, rinse immediately and discontinue use. We recommend patch testing. For external use only.

Common Uses

Key Benefits:
• Bakuchiol – a natural, plant derived alternative to retinol designed to reduce fine lines and slow the signs of ageing.
• A super charged antioxidant rich Australian native complex of Davidson Plum, Emu Apple (containing 10X more antioxidants than blueberries) and Tasmanian Pepper Berry
• EFA rich Kangaroo Paw
• Radiance enhancing Turmeric, Lilly Pilly and Carrot
• Skin nourishing Rosehip, Burdock, Moringa and Baobab
• Complexion correcting Green Tea, Aniseed Myrtle, Nettle and Horsetail
